Title: Family Ties
Plot: Earth provides sanctuary for Vala's estranged, con artist father after he provides intel about a Jaffa plot to attack the planet.
GuestStars: Lexa Doig, Bill Dow, Gary Jones, Dan Shea, Fred Willard, Fulvio Cecere, Martin Christopher, Robin Richardson, Doreen Ramus, Lillianne Dieuique-Lee, Paul Wu
